goals__remit: E.ON is an international privately-owned provider of sustainable energy solutions. E.ON focusses on energy networks, customer solutions and renewables, which are the building blocks of the new energy world. Our 835,000 km power and gas networks connect 17 m customers in Europe making it the backbone of the new energy world. We are supplying more than 24 m customers with power, heat and energy solutions in Europe. With 3,3 gigawatt installed capacity in onshore wind and photovoltaics and 1,1, gigawatt in offshore wind we are one of the pacemakers in renewable energy worldwide (Europe and Northern America).
